name: "Fire in the racists" #1
description: Illustrator and animator graduating in college, Fan of adult cartoons, and I wanted to do my first animation as an acidcartoon, and of important social content, for not being just any animation, then something that all over the world we have encountered this problem, being racism, and a phrase used in Brazil as a fight against racism , inspired me in the animation, the phrase in portuguese is "Fogo nos racistas" or or translating to "fire in the racists"
